Package pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.strategy

Class LandformsUnit

java.lang.Object
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.strategy.LandformsUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
CeilingUnit, FloorUnit, PlatformUnit, WallUnit
public abstract class LandformsUnit extends Object implements GameObject
LandformsUnit implement GameObject interface. LandformsUnit is a GameObject whose coordinates do not change
Author:
YuyanZhou

    • LandformsUnit

      public LandformsUnit​(GameWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum, int width, int height)
      Constructor of LandformsUnit, pass GameWorld, size, coordinate to create LandformsUnit
      Parameters:
      world - Where the LandformsUnit need to add
      colNum - value to calculate x coordinate of LandformsUnit
      rowNum - value to calculate y coordinate of LandformsUnit
      width - width of LandformsUnit
      height - height of LandformsUnit
